diamond.title: We're keeping score
diamond.content: We are keeping track of your activity on the platform. All aboard!

tooltip.bonus: Bonus points are earned when you interact with Bonus collections (they have a special icon) on the Marketplace

banner.description.1: During Season 1, users who buy, sell, and list NFTs on Night Market will be rewarded with Tickets. Tickets will be redeemable for [REDACTED] at the end of the Season. ðŸ‘€
banner.description.2: The more you earn, the better the prizes will be. Happy Trading!

popup.buySome: Buy some NFT or Sell it. Participate in various activities such as auctions.
popup.youWill: You will receive points for each such action.
